sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Collections.css'; const Collections = () => { const [activeCategory, setActiveCategory] = useState('all'); const [selectedPlant, setSelectedPlant] = useState(null); const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const categories = [ { id: 'all', name: 'All Plants', icon: '🌿' }, { id: 'indoor', name: 'Indoor Plants', icon: '🏠' }, { id: 'outdoor', name: 'Outdoor Plants', icon: '🌳' }, { id: 'fruits', name: 'Fruit Plants', icon: '🍎' }, { id: 'flowers', name: 'Flowering Plants', icon: '🌺' }, { id: 'herbs', name: 'Herbs & Medicinal', icon: '🌱' } ]; const plants = [ // Indoor Plants { id: 1, name: 'Monstera Deliciosa', category: 'indoor', price: '₹899', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1545241047-6083a3684587?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Beautiful split-leaf philodendron perfect for bright indoor spaces' }, { id: 2, name: 'Snake Plant', category: 'indoor', price: '₹599', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1593691509543-c55fb32d8de5?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Low-maintenance air purifier, perfect for beginners' }, { id: 3, name: 'Peace Lily', category: 'indoor', price: '₹749', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1416879595882-3373a0480b5b?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Elegant white flowers with glossy green leaves' }, { id: 4, name: 'Rubber Plant', category: 'indoor', price: '₹699', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1586201375761-83865001e31c?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Glossy leaves and easy care make this a favorite', details: 'The Rubber Plant (Ficus elastica) is a popular houseplant known for its thick, glossy leaves and easy care requirements. It can grow quite tall indoors and is excellent for purifying air. Prefers bright, indirect light and watering when soil feels dry.' }, // Outdoor Plants { id: 5, name: 'Rose Bush', category: 'outdoor', price: '₹1299', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1455659817273-f96807779a8a?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Classic red roses for your garden', details: 'Beautiful rose bushes that produce fragrant, classic red blooms. Roses require well-drained soil, full sunlight (6+ hours daily), and regular watering. Perfect for creating romantic garden spaces and excellent for cut flowers.' }, { id: 6, name: 'Jasmine Vine', category: 'outdoor', price: '₹899', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1595348020949-87cdfbb44174?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Fragrant white flowers, perfect for fences' }, { id: 7, name: 'Bougainvillea', category: 'outdoor', price: '₹799', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1590736969955-71cc94901144?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Vibrant colorful bracts, drought tolerant', details: 'Bougainvillea is a drought-tolerant climbing plant known for its vibrant papery bracts in colors like magenta, purple, red, orange, and white. Perfect for hot climates, it requires full sun and minimal water once established. Great for walls, fences, and trellises.' }, { id: 8, name: 'Hibiscus', category: 'outdoor', price: '₹649', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1597848212624-e6ec2d17d05a?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Large tropical flowers in various colors', details: 'Hibiscus plants produce large, showy flowers in vibrant colors including red, pink, yellow, and white. They thrive in warm climates with full to partial sun. Regular watering and well-draining soil are essential. Blooms attract butterflies and hummingbirds.' }, // Fruit Plants { id: 9, name: 'Mango Tree', category: 'fruits', price: '₹1899', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1553279091-75a834b9c2e5?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'King of fruits, grafted variety', details: 'Grafted mango trees that produce sweet, juicy mangoes. These trees prefer tropical to subtropical climates with full sun exposure. They need well-draining soil and regular watering during growing season. Fruit production typically begins 3-5 years after planting.' }, { id: 10, name: 'Lemon Tree', category: 'fruits', price: '₹1299', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1571771894821-ce9b6c11b08e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Fresh lemons year-round' }, { id: 11, name: 'Pomegranate', category: 'fruits', price: '₹1599', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1605027990121-cbae9ff08653?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Antioxidant-rich ruby red fruits', details: 'Pomegranate trees produce nutrient-rich fruits packed with antioxidants. They are drought-tolerant once established and prefer full sun. The trees can handle various soil types but need good drainage. Fruits ripen in fall and can be stored for months.' }, { id: 12, name: 'Guava Tree', category: 'fruits', price: '₹1199', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1586201375761-83865001e31c?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Sweet and nutritious tropical fruit' }, // Flowering Plants { id: 13, name: 'Marigold', category: 'flowers', price: '₹299', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1597848212624-e6ec2d17d05a?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Bright orange and yellow blooms' }, { id: 14, name: 'Sunflower', category: 'flowers', price: '₹399', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1597848212624-e6ec2d17d05a?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Tall, cheerful yellow flowers' }, { id: 15, name: 'Dahlia', category: 'flowers', price: '₹549', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1595348020949-87cdfbb44174?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Large, colorful blooms in many varieties' }, { id: 16, name: 'Petunia', category: 'flowers', price: '₹349', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1590736969955-71cc94901144?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Cascading flowers perfect for hanging baskets' }, // Herbs & Medicinal { id: 17, name: 'Tulsi (Holy Basil)', category: 'herbs', price: '₹199', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1628556270448-4d4e4148e1b1?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Sacred plant with medicinal properties' }, { id: 18, name: 'Aloe Vera', category: 'herbs', price: '₹299', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1509423350716-97f2360af2e4?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Healing succulent for skin care' }, { id: 19, name: 'Mint Plant', category: 'herbs', price: '₹149', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1628556270448-4d4e4148e1b1?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Fresh mint for teas and cooking' }, { id: 20, name: 'Neem Tree', category: 'herbs', price: '₹899', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1558618666-fcd25c85cd64?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=80', description: 'Natural pesticide and medicinal tree' } ]; const filteredPlants = activeCategory === 'all' ? plants : plants.filter(plant => plant.category === activeCategory); const handleQuickView = (plant) => { setSelectedPlant(plant); setShowModal(true); }; const closeModal = () => { setShowModal(false); setSelectedPlant(null); }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Featured Collections

🏡

Indoor Paradise

Transform your home with our selection of air-purifying indoor plants

🌺

Garden Blooms

Create a colorful garden with our flowering plants and seasonal varieties

🍎

Fruit Orchard

Grow your own fresh fruits with our healthy fruit trees and plants

{/* Care Tips Section */}

Plant Care Tips

💧

Watering

Water when the top inch of soil feels dry. Different plants have different water needs.

☀️

Lighting

Most plants need bright, indirect light. Avoid direct sunlight for indoor plants.

🌡️

Temperature

Keep plants in stable temperatures between 65-75°F for optimal growth.

🌱

Fertilizing

Feed your plants with balanced fertilizer during growing season (spring-summer).

); }; export default Collections;
